title: Legendre moment
summary: In mathematics, Legendre moments are a type of image moment and are achieved by using the Legendre polynomial.  Legendre moments are used in areas of image processing including: pattern and object recognition, image indexing, line fitting, feature extraction, edge detection, and texture analysis.[1]  Legendre moments have been studied as a means to reduce image moment calculation complexity by limiting the amount of information redundancy through approximation.[2]
